when i try to download, the files inside the torrent are labled "the girl with the dragon tatoo", not Neverland. :S

Torrent is titled "Neverland", IMDB link is for "Arthur Christmas", and movie is "The girl with the dragon tattoo".............hmmmmm, I'm not sure if I can give you a pass on this one froggie, you do plenty of good work but this is not one of your strong moments.

825 seeders - and no word as to whether this is actually TGWTDT or actually Neverland. Anyways, when running the torrent it comes up as TGWTDT and the sample.avi is of TGWTDT. *TGWTDG = The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo. To froggie100 - good to know you're human too! Peace all.
